General.Name: TR Property Investment Trust plc
General.Description: TR Property Investment Trust plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched by F&C Investment Business Ltd. The fund is managed by Thames River Capital LLP. It invests in public equity markets of Europe. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies that are operating in the real estate sector. It primarily invests in growth stocks of companies across all market capitalizations. The fund also makes direct investments in property. It benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the FTSE EPRA/NAREIT Developed Europe Capped Net Total Return Index. TR Property Investment Trust plc was formed in 1905 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 51 Berkeley Square, London, United Kingdom, W1J 5BB
